content.raw: True, but this requires them to search and replace `gazebo::math` with `ignition::math` everywhere in their code. With the approach in `ign_math_scpeters`, I think we could keep the `gazebo::math` typedefs even after we've fully switched to using ignition, by deleting the `#else` block from the gazebo/math header files ([for example](#!/osrf/gazebo/compare/ign_math_scpeters%0Ddefault#chg-gazebo/math/Vector3.hh)). That seems valuable to me. Does it seem valuable to you?
